name: Hyperdevotion Noire: Ultimate Member “Sting”
detailed_description:
Unlock Sting as a playable character in Hyperdevotion Noire: Goddess Black Heart! Play through the new scenario [Defeat Mystery Girl!] to add her into your party!

After purchase of this pack, reach either of the criteria below to unlock the new scenario:
*If loading a saved game, proceed to the next chapter.
*If starting a new game, proceed to Chapter 2.
*If starting a cleared game save, proceed to Chapter 2.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 (32bit, 64bit)
  • Процессор: 3 GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • Место на диске: 3 GB
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Дополнительно: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 8.1 (64bit) or later
  • Процессор: 3.1 GHz Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0
  • Место на диске: 8 GB
  • Звуковая карта: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Дополнительно: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series
